services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Connecting truck dealers with unmatched expertise and reliable solutions. Your trusted partner for seamless trading and exceptional support.
services.allBrandsDescription: Explore the complete list of global car manufacturers - from iconic giants to emerging innovators.
services.freeSupportDescription: Enjoy 24/7 reliable assistance - our free support team is always here to help with any questions or issues you may have!
services.dealershipDescription: Find trusted dealerships near you - connecting you to the best deals and services for your dream car.
services.affordableDescription: Quality and value combined - discover affordable options without compromising on excellence.

footer.description: The sites Trucktrader.nl, Trucktrader.be, Trucktrader.lu, and Trucktrader.world (all languages) are very user-friendly so that the selling party has to make virtually no effort to display its complete stock.

aboutHeader.title: About TruckTrader
aboutHeader.description: The sites Trucktrader.nl, Trucktrader.be, Trucktrader.lu, and Trucktrader.world (all languages) are very user-friendly so that the selling party has to make virtually no effort to display its complete stock. Of course, we also have to inform the user/buyer who can quickly view the advertisements he wants via our advanced search engine; in short, a platform where buyer and seller meet to close THE DEAL!

userFriendly.title: User-friendly, for both the selling and purchasing parties
userFriendly.description: Designed to Make Buying and Selling Simple, Seamless, and Enjoyable for Everyone

greatReach.title: A platform with great reach and exposure
greatReach.description: A Powerful Platform to Broaden Your Audience and Maximize Visibility for Your Listings

cheapPlacement.title: Quick and cheap placement of car stock
cheapPlacement.description: Quick and Cost-Effective Placement for Car Listings, Banners, and Advertorials

highQuality.title: High quality advertisements at very competitive prices
highQuality.description: Delivering High-Quality Advertisements at Exceptionally Competitive Prices

readyMadeFeedsSection.title: There are currently connections with ready-made feeds at:
readyMadeFeedsSection.subtitle: Seamlessly integrate with our ready-made feeds, connecting you to multiple platforms instantly.

howDoWeGetStarted.title: How Do We Get Started
howDoWeGetStarted.subtitle: Enhance your brand visibility with complimentary logo placement included in all your advertisements

step1.title: We place all your advertisements completely automatically and they are visible in real time
step1.description: We automate all your advertisements, ensuring they go live seamlessly and are visible in real time.

step2.title: With every advertisement a direct link to your webshop/website
step2.description: Every ad connects directly to your webshop, driving instant traffic and engagements.

step3.title: All your advertisements are automatically up to date
step3.description: Keep your ads fresh and relevant—automatically updated in real time.

step4.title: Free placement of your logo with the advertisements
step4.description: Enhance your brand visibility with complimentary logo placement included in all your advertisements.

xmlFeedSection.title: If no XML feed is available:

customFeeds.title: Custom In-House XML Feeds on Request
customFeeds.description: If not yet available, Trucktrader will create the XML feed for you in-house (based on a quotation).

webFeeds.title: XML Feeds by Your Web Administrator
webFeeds.description: You can have an XML feed developed by the administrator of your own website.

description.title: Descriptions
description.content: Compact and efficient, the 2019 Volvo Mini Truck offers a 3,500 kg payload, fuel-efficient diesel engine, and advanced safety features. Its ergonomic cab ensures comfort, making it ideal for urban deliveries.

swipper.title: Volvo Mini Truck 2019
swipper.description: Compact and efficient, the 2019 Volvo Mini Truck offers a 3,500 kg payload, fuel-efficient diesel engine, and advanced safety features.
